smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function onStart is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function onViewCreated is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class MainActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function onStart appears to be too complex.
The function onViewCreated appears to be too complex.
The function onCreate appears to be too complex.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: PackageNaming

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: data!!.getParcelableExtra(RingtoneManager.EXTRA_RINGTONE_PICKED_URI) cannot be safely cast to Uri.
getSystemService(Context.INPUT_METHOD_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to InputMethodManager.
context.getSystemService(Context.ALARM_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to AlarmManager.
context.getSystemService(Context.ALARM_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to AlarmManager.
ctx.getSystemService(Context.NOTIFICATION_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to NotificationManager.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of StatsActivity.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of MainActivity.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of BottomSheetFragment.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of AppUtils.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (ChartXValueFormatter(dateArray)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ChartXValueFormatter(dateArray)
Parentheses in (inTook * 100 / totalIntake) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: inTook * 100 / totalIntake
Parentheses in (inTook / totalIntake.toFloat()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: inTook / totalIntake.toFloat()
Parentheses in (inTook * 100 / totalIntake) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: inTook * 100 / totalIntake
Parentheses in (weight * 100 / 3.0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: weight * 100 / 3.0
Parentheses in (workTime / 6 * 7) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: workTime / 6 * 7
Parentheses in ((weight * 100 / 3.0) + (workTime / 6 * 7)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: (weight * 100 / 3.0) + (workTime / 6 * 7)
Parentheses in (percent < 100) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: percent < 100

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
